title: Repair Please
body:
Is it too much to ask for a "Repair" option at launch screen?..

I've had to uninstall/re-install a few times. Takes awhile..   : (

Just recently my AVG removed one measly file and i had to re-download the lot.

replies.body:
>Just recently my AVG removed one measly file and i had to re-download the lot.

Strange. Normally it would just detect the missing file and download it.

And there is a repair button on the launch screen. Click on the question mark on the upper right part of the patcher/launcher.
